about.description: This package contains a variety of utility functions I have used in the past few years for data analysis.
about.summary: A collection of various tools for data analysis built on top of xarray and xgcm

name: xarrayutils
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "xarrayutils" %}
{% set version = "0.1.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6cc6bd993d449ab375384f1f8004fb4fa5b74c28eb9b1e9b3e66c358b303be8e

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - pytest-runner
  run:
    - python
    - xarray
    - numpy
    - matplotlib
    - scipy
    - astropy
    - dask

test:
  imports:
    - xarrayutils

about:
  home: https://github.com/jbusecke/xarrayutils
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A collection of various tools for data analysis built on top of xarray and xgcm

  description: This package contains a variety of utility functions I have used in the past few years for data analysis.
  dev_url: https://github.com/jbusecke/xarrayutils

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jbusecke
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.6.15
